attribute.value: select distinct fapz.fabh key, fapz.famc value from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_khzbpz khzbpz on khzbpz.fabh = fapz.fabh where fapz.khdx = '2' and fapz.khnf =cast( substr(cast($tjrq$ as char(8)),1,4) as integer) and khzbpz.jsfs = '3' and fapz.zt = '1'

select distinct zbpz.khzbdh as key, zbpz.xmmc as value from khfa_khzbpz zbpz where zbpz.jsfs = '3' and zbpz.khzbdh <= 0 and zbpz.fabh in( select distinct fapz.fabh from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_khzbpz khzbpz on khzbpz.fabh = fapz.fabh where fapz.khdx = '2' and fapz.khnf =cast( substr(cast($tjrq$ as char(8)),1,4) as integer) and khzbpz.jsfs = '3' and fapz.fabh = $khfa$ and fapz.zt = '1' )
union all select distinct jg.khzbdh as key, jg.khzbmc as value from khfa_khzbpz zbpz inner join khfa_khzb_hy jg on jg.khzbdh = zbpz.khzbdh where zbpz.jsfs = '3' and zbpz.khzbdh > 0 and zbpz.fabh in( select distinct fapz.fabh from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_khzbpz khzbpz on khzbpz.fabh = fapz.fabh where fapz.khdx = '2' and fapz.khnf =cast( substr(cast($tjrq$ as char(8)),1,4) as integer) and khzbpz.jsfs = '3' and fapz.fabh = $khfa$ and fapz.zt = '1' )

sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzxpfdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'统计日期输入错误，格式应该是:yyyyMMdd!' where f_java_rule_date(t.tjrq,'yyyyMMdd')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzxpfdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'评分输入错误，只能输入:21位整数,4位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.pf)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.pf,21,4)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzxpfdr_temp t set error=error||'考核方案不存在!' where not exists ( select 1 from khfa_fapz fapz where trim(t.famc)=trim(fapz.famc) and fapz.zt='1' and cast(substr(cast(t.tjrq as char(8)),1,4) as integer)=cast(fapz.khnf as integer)) and cast(t.khdxdh as integer)=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzxpfdr_temp t set error=error||'考核指标不存在!' where not exists ( select 1 from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_khzbpz khzbpz on khzbpz.fabh = fapz.fabh inner join khfa_khzb_hy jg on jg.khzbdh = khzbpz.khzbdh where trim(t.famc)=trim(fapz.famc) and fapz.zt = '1' and trim(t.khzb)=trim(jg.khzbmc) and cast(substr(cast(t.tjrq as char(8)),1,4) as integer)=cast(fapz.khnf as integer) and khzbpz.khzbdh >0 union all select 1 from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_khzbpz khzbpz on khzbpz.fabh = fapz.fabh where trim(t.famc) = trim(fapz.famc) and fapz.zt = '1' and trim(t.khzb) = trim(khzbpz.xmmc) and cast(substr(cast(t.tjrq as char(8)), 1, 4) as integer) = cast(fapz.khnf as integer) and khzbpz.khzbdh <= 0 ) and cast(t.khdxdh as integer)=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzxpfdr_temp t set error=error||'行员代号和名称必须一致' where not exists ( select 1 from khdx_hy hy where t.hydh=hy.hydh and hy.hymc=t.hymc) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzxpfdr_temp t set error=error||'评分不能大于最高分，或者小于最低分!' where exists ( select 1 from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_khzbpz khzbpz on khzbpz.fabh = fapz.fabh inner join khfa_khzb_hy jg on jg.khzbdh = khzbpz.khzbdh where trim(t.famc)=trim(fapz.famc) and trim(t.khzb)=trim(jg.khzbmc) and cast(substr(cast(t.tjrq as char(8)),1,4) as integer)=cast(fapz.khnf as integer) and khzbpz.khzbdh >0 and (khzbpz.bdz > cast(t.pf as decimal(25,4)) or khzbpz.fdz < cast(t.pf as decimal(25,4)) ) union all select 1 from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_khzbpz khzbpz on khzbpz.fabh = fapz.fabh where trim(t.famc) = trim(fapz.famc) and trim(t.khzb) = trim(khzbpz.xmmc) and cast(substr(cast(t.tjrq as char(8)), 1, 4) as integer) = cast(fapz.khnf as integer) and khzbpz.khzbdh <= 0 and (khzbpz.bdz > cast(t.pf as decimal(25,4)) or khzbpz.fdz < cast(t.pf as decimal(25,4))) ) and cast(t.khdxdh as integer)=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzxpfdr_temp t set error=error||'数据已存在!' where exists ( select 1 from khfa_zxpffa fa inner join khfa_fapz fapz on fapz.fabh = fa.fabh inner join khdx_hy jg on jg.khdxdh = fa.khdxdh where fapz.zt = '1' and cast(t.tjrq as integer)=fa.khqm and t.khdxdh = fa.pjr and fa.pjsj is not null and t.famc=fapz.famc and jg.hymc = t.hymc and jg.hydh = t.hydh and fa.khdx ='2' )and cast(t.khdxdh as integer)=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyzxpfdr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where 1=2 and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE hyzxpfdr_temp ( tjrq varchar(100) , famc varchar(100) , khzb varchar(100) , hydh varchar(100) , hymc varchar(100) , bzf varchar(100) , zgf varchar(100) , zdf varchar(100) , pf varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from hyzxpfdr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from hyzxpfdr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tjrq,famc,khzb,hydh,hymc,bzf,zgf,zdf,pf,khdxdh,error from hyzxpfdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, tjrq,famc,khzb,hydh,hymc,bzf,zgf,zdf,pf,khdxdh,error from hyzxpfdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tjrq,famc,khzb,hydh,hymc,bzf,zgf,zdf,pf,khdxdh,error from hyzxpfdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into KHFA_ZXPFZ(FABH,KHQS,KHZBDH,PJR,KHDXDH,PJBZBH,PF,KHZQ,KHDX) select cast (t.famc as DECIMAL(38,0)),cast (t.famc as DECIMAL(38,0)),KHFA_KHZB_JG0.KHZBDH,cast (t.famc as DECIMAL(38,0)),KHDX_HY1.KHDXDH,cast (t.bzf as DECIMAL(38,0)),cast (t.pf as DECIMAL(25,4)),cast (t.zgf as DECIMAL(38,0)), t.zdf from hyzxpfdr_temp t ,KHFA_KHZB_JG KHFA_KHZB_JG0,KHDX_HY KHDX_HY1 where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null) and KHFA_KHZB_JG0.KHZBMC=cast (t.tjrq as VARCHAR(100)) and KHDX_HY1.HYDH=cast (t.hydh as VARCHAR(20))
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update khfa_zxpffa zx set zx.pfzt = '1',pjsj = F_GET_SYSTIME() where zx.pjr=$login_khdxdh$ and exists( select 1 from $temp$ t inner join khfa_fapz fapz on t.famc=fapz.famc and cast(substr(cast(t.tjrq as char(8)),1,4) as integer)=cast(fapz.khnf as integer) inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.hydh = t.hydh and hy.hymc = t.hymc where zx.fabh = fapz.fabh and zx.khqm = cast(t.tjrq as integer) and zx.pjr = t.khdxdh and hy.khdxdh = zx.khdxdh and zx.khdx='2' )

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update khfa_zxpfz zx set zx.pf = ( select cast(t.pf as decimal(25,4)) from $temp$ t inner join khfa_fapz fapz on t.famc=fapz.famc and cast(substr(cast(t.tjrq as char(8)),1,4) as integer)=cast(fapz.khnf as integer) left join khfa_khzbpz pz on fapz.fabh=pz.fabh left join khfa_khzb_hy zbjg on pz.khzbdh=zbjg.khzbdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.hydh = t.hydh and hy.hymc = t.hymc where zx.fabh = fapz.fabh and zx.khqm = cast(t.tjrq as integer) and zx.pjr = t.khdxdh and hy.khdxdh = zx.khdxdh and coalesce(zbjg.khzbmc,pz.xmmc)=t.khzb and pz.khzbdh=zx.khzbdh and zx.khdx='2' AND pz.jsfs='3' AND fapz.yyzlbh=2 ),zx.pjbzbh = -1 where exists( select 1 from $temp$ t inner join khfa_fapz fapz on t.famc=fapz.famc and cast(substr(cast(t.tjrq as char(8)),1,4) as integer)=cast(fapz.khnf as integer) left join khfa_khzbpz pz on fapz.fabh=pz.fabh left join khfa_khzb_hy zbjg on pz.khzbdh=zbjg.khzbdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.hydh = t.hydh and hy.hymc = t.hymc where zx.fabh = fapz.fabh and zx.khqm = cast(t.tjrq as integer) and zx.pjr = t.khdxdh and hy.khdxdh = zx.khdxdh and coalesce(zbjg.khzbmc,pz.xmmc)=t.khzb and pz.khzbdh=zx.khzbdh and zx.khdx='2' AND pz.jsfs='3' AND fapz.yyzlbh=2)
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct $tjrq$ as tjrq , fapz.famc ,coalesce(zbjg.khzbmc,khzbpz.xmmc) as khzbmc, khzbpz.zbqz as bzf,khzbpz.bdz as zdf,khzbpz.fdz as zgf ,jg.hymc,jg.hydh as hydh,zxpfz.pf from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_khzbpz khzbpz on fapz.fabh = khzbpz.fabh left join khfa_khzb_hy zbjg on zbjg.khzbdh = khzbpz.khzbdh inner join khfa_zxpffa zxpffa on zxpffa.fabh = fapz.fabh inner join khfa_zxpfz zxpfz on fapz.fabh = zxpfz.fabh and zxpffa.khqs=zxpfz.khqs and zxpffa.pjr=zxpfz.pjr and zxpfz.khdx='2' and zxpfz.khzbdh = khzbpz.khzbdh AND zxpffa.KHDXDH=ZXPFZ.KHDXDH inner join khdx_hy jg on jg.khdxdh = zxpfz.khdxdh where 1=1 and fapz.khnf = $tjrq_yyyy$ and fapz.fabh in ($khfa$) and zxpfz.pjr=$khdhmrz$ and zxpffa.khqm=$tjrq$ and khzbpz.jsfs='3' and zxpffa.khzt ='1' and fapz.zt ='1' and khzbpz.khzbdh in ($khzb$) and zxpffa.pfzt = '$pfzt$' order by fapz.famc

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct fapz.fabh key, fapz.famc value from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_khzbpz khzbpz on khzbpz.fabh = fapz.fabh where fapz.khdx = '2' and fapz.khnf =cast( substr(cast($tjrq$ as char(8)),1,4) as integer) and khzbpz.jsfs = '3' and fapz.zt = '1'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct zbpz.khzbdh as key, zbpz.xmmc as value from khfa_khzbpz zbpz where zbpz.jsfs = '3' and zbpz.khzbdh <= 0 and zbpz.fabh in( select distinct fapz.fabh from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_khzbpz khzbpz on khzbpz.fabh = fapz.fabh where fapz.khdx = '2' and fapz.khnf =cast( substr(cast($tjrq$ as char(8)),1,4) as integer) and khzbpz.jsfs = '3' and fapz.fabh = $khfa$ and fapz.zt = '1' )
union all select distinct jg.khzbdh as key, jg.khzbmc as value from khfa_khzbpz zbpz inner join khfa_khzb_hy jg on jg.khzbdh = zbpz.khzbdh where zbpz.jsfs = '3' and zbpz.khzbdh > 0 and zbpz.fabh in( select distinct fapz.fabh from khfa_fapz fapz inner join khfa_khzbpz khzbpz on khzbpz.fabh = fapz.fabh where fapz.khdx = '2' and fapz.khnf =cast( substr(cast($tjrq$ as char(8)),1,4) as integer) and khzbpz.jsfs = '3' and fapz.fabh = $khfa$ and fapz.zt = '1' )
